html:
Starting Monday, Lawson and Circle K Power Cubes will be changed into a new XM construct named the Hypercube. The functionality of will be the same as the previous two XM constructs. Any Lawson or Circle K Power Cubes you have in your inventory will be automatically updated. pic.twitter.com/sAqHYqmMXS

— Ingress (@ingress) 2019年12月12日

とうとう Lawson も Ingress から撤退かな。もはやメリットないもん。
